newsitem.title: USA: Automedix Sciences to buy Complete Communications.
newsitem.headline: Automedix Sciences to buy Complete Communications.

text.p: Automedix Sciences Inc Wednesday said it agreed to buy 100 percent of Complete Communications Inc shares in exchange for stock, which will represent 85 percent of Automedix shares.
The acquisition of COMC has been approved by the required two-thirds of the holders of Automedix Science's shares and will become effective on or about November 6, 1996.

Automedix has been inactive for the past four years. However, it now intends to make all required filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. It expects its stock to resume trading on or about Nov. 6, 1996.

Automedix's board has approved an increase from 20 million to 40 million in authorized shares, a one-for-10 reverse split of Automedix Sciences shares, the conversion of the Class B common stock of the company into common stock on a share-for-share basis, the elimination of the Class B Common stock of the company from its authorized capital and a change of the company's name to Complete Communications Inc.
